hero.description: Your virtual assistant available by phone. Manage your files, record notes, organize your daily work.

verticals.title: Designed for Real Estate Professionals
verticals.subtitle: An AI assistant always available to support your daily activities.

realEstate.title: Guillaume - Real Estate AI Assistant
realEstate.description: Call Guillaume whenever you need. Record visit notes, ask questions, organize information. He adapts to your needs and automatically syncs with Airtable.

instantResponse.title: Always Available
instantResponse.description: Call anytime to record information, ask questions, or organize your files. Guillaume is there 24/7.

multilingual.title: Smart Sync
multilingual.description: Your conversations are automatically structured and synced to your Airtable database. No manual entry needed.

integration.title: Flexible & Adaptive
integration.description: Guillaume adapts to your needs. Visit notes, general questions, file organization - he handles everything naturally.
